description: Sum of degrees of irreducible representations of alternating group A_n.
references: J. H. Conway, R. T. Curtis, S. P. Norton, R. A. Parker and R. A. Wilson, ATLAS of Finite Groups. Oxford Univ. Press, 1985.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Eric M. Schmidt, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..35
prog: (GAP) A007002 := n -> Sum(List(Irr(CharacterTable("Alternating", n)), chi->chi[1])); # _Eric M. Schmidt_, Apr 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Eric M. Schmidt_, Apr 12 2013
